Name: Knife To Meet You
About the game: CAN YOU HIT THE APPLE ON THE HEAD? Be the knifemaster who makes the most stunning tricks! You can do whatever you want, and complete a level in different ways. All in bullet time slow mo! You can play only for fun or competitively online: in any 10 sec game you have a chance to break the World Record, visible for all players! You have 2 knives at start. Earn gold to buy other weapons by completing story levels, achievements, online battle levels, finding treasures, winning challenges. And a mega bonus for inviting your friend. We reward every invite with 50X multiplier now! TRICKS YOU CAN DO: - Stuck, Slice, Pierce, Pin objects - all can be part of a multi combo! - Hat Trick: hit your friend's hat without hitting him! - Team Trick: pass a knife to your friend who finishes the job! - Underhand Trick: Throw with reverse spin and hit a target! - Spin Trick: Spin the knife at least 450 degrees before hitting the target! - Overtake Trick: Triple combo an object but in different order! - Sacrifice Trick: Quickly hit your partner after you have completed the level. EARLY ACCESS FEATURES: - 50 Story Levels - 3000+ online map levels - XP and gold system - 25 weapons (No-Spin Knife, Spin Knife, Axe, Fork, Cleaver, Nails, Card, Sickle, Scythe, Sword, Shuriken, Sawblade, Sabre, Dart, Spear, Tomahawk, Swiss Knife, Frisbee, Boomerang, Crossbow, Pistol) - Leaderboard for each weapon, each level! - Survival levels: how far can you get? - Flexible replay system - One-chance Circus: online challenge each day where you can try only once (new levels each day). OTHER PLANS (WHAT HE HOPE): Even more characters, for example a wooden dog for the ringmaster (sleep and chase phases) Interactive crowd who can be happy or angry (throwing coins or tomato at the characters) Complex physics weapons (crazy weapons like: knife-grenade, harpoon, a battle-chicken which start to run on landing, chain-jointed-weapons, swordfish with sticky nose and big jaws, etc) Friends Leaderboard Character customization saved in replays (animations, craving, annual rings, wood types, etc) Even more physics objects (rope, fire, water, explosion, etc) CAUTION Cut Hazard: Product has functional sharp edges. Contact may result in injury. Always keep blades away from fingers and body. Handle with care. Use with adult supervision.
